profile.name: Frieze Kere Wandabwa
profile.title: Head of IT | IT Strategy, Governance & Digital Transformation

summary: Strategic IT Leader with over eight years of progressive experience directing IT governance, infrastructure, cybersecurity, and service management across multi-site environments. Proven ability to execute IT strategy aligned to business objectives, strengthen data protection and compliance frameworks, optimise IT budgets, and lead cross-functional technical teams delivering secure and high-availability systems. Experienced in supporting enterprise operations for global organisations including DHL, AWS, Cisco, and the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation. Recognised for driving operational excellence, mitigating risk, and enabling scalable digital transformation initiatives.
executiveScale: 8+ Years IT Leadership  ·  15 Multi-Site Centres  ·  15+ Engineers Led  ·  Multi-Million KES Budget

achievements.text: Directed IT operations across 15 multi-site centres, ensuring secure and reliable infrastructure supporting enterprise clients including DHL, AWS, Cisco, and the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation
Governed IT service management processes aligned to ITIL standards, reducing incident resolution time by 40% and improving overall service quality across all sites
Strengthened organisational data protection and endpoint security posture through structured access governance and risk controls, reducing security vulnerabilities by 30%
Oversaw vendor contracts and SLAs to ensure accountability, performance optimisation, and cost efficiency, achieving 20% reduction in operational IT spend
Led IT budget planning and resource allocation across the multi-site portfolio while maintaining 99.9% service availability for 1,000+ enterprise users
Provided executive-level reporting on IT performance, risk posture, and continuous improvement initiatives to senior leadership and client stakeholders
Spearheaded Microsoft 365 and Azure adoption programme, enabling secure cloud collaboration and reducing on-premise infrastructure dependency across all centres
Led a regional infrastructure deployment programme spanning 500+ sites, expanding enterprise-grade connectivity and supporting national digital access objectives
Managed and mentored a team of 15+ engineers and technicians across multiple regions, aligning delivery performance with contract SLAs and quality standards
Established compliance and safety governance frameworks aligned to ISO, OHS, and Pre-PAT standards, reducing project delivery risk and improving audit outcomes
Negotiated vendor and OEM contracts with Huawei, Nokia, Cisco, and Ericsson, improving SLA compliance and achieving cost savings through optimised procurement
Oversaw multi-million-shilling IT infrastructure budgets, ensuring cost control while sustaining high-quality delivery outcomes across a geographically dispersed programme
Designed and implemented a digital records management system for 50,000+ regulatory files, improving compliance, accessibility, and audit readiness
Contributed to Information Security Management System activities in support of ISO 27001 certification, aligning documentation and access controls to standard requirements
Supported regulatory compliance operations by administering licence processing aligned to national ICT regulatory frameworks
Supported operational management of communication, ground navigation, and surveillance systems critical to aviation safety and regulatory compliance
Conducted preventive maintenance and technical documentation for aviation ICT infrastructure in support of regulatory audit requirements
